Reference

All functions

terms_by_date() unigrams_by_date() bigrams_by_date()

Split a text source into tokens and terms by date of occurrence

plot_term_frequencies()

Plot individual term frequencies by date in a faceted plot

plot_topic_frequencies()

Plot individual topic frequencies by date in a faceted plot

primary_topics()

Document counts and mean topic shares of the three primary topics for each document

sample_dfm

Document-feature-matrix of the inaugural presidential speeches

sample_topic_doc_probs

Per-document topic probabilities for the sample topics

sample_topics

A STM topic model of the inaugural presidential speeches

select_top_terms()

Select top terms by count, trend metric and/or name pattern

select_top_topics()

Select top topics by document counts or temporal trend metric

term_counts()

Count unique terms in a text source

term_frequencies()

Compute the frequency of terms within in a chosen time period

terms_dfm()

Create a document-feature-matrix from a text source

terms_tokens_map()

Summarize mappings between terms and tokens from a text source

topic_frequencies()

Compute topic shares for a given time bin

topics_by_doc_date()

Extract topic likelihoods per document for an STM topic model

topics_summary()

Mean topic likelihoods summary

topics_terms_map()

Extract a mapping between topics and representative topic terms from an STM

topicsplorrr

topicsplorrr: A Package Supporting Topical Text Analysis, Exploration and Visualization
